extendedInfo.description: DrivebookLite presents the UK driving theory test practice tool in android. This application contains 70+ questions in 14 topics. Practice these questions from our full version(for Â£1.99), you are certain to pass the test.============================================================PLEASE NOTE THAT ONLY 5 QUESTIONS PER CHAPTER IS AVAILABLE IN THE LITE VERSION============================================================FULL VERSION:==============Full version of this product is available with 970+ questions and unlimited test practice.PREPARE BY TOPICS:================== 1. Accidents 2. Alertness 3. Attitude 4. Documents 5. Hazard Awareness 6. Motorway Rules 7. Other Types of Vehicle 8. Road and Traffic Signs 9. Rules of the Road10. Safety Margins11. Safety and Your Vehicle12. Vehicle Handling13. Vehicle Loading14. Vulnerable Road UsersTEST MODE:=========Mock test simulates the real test format. Questions are presented randomly from each topic using the DSA formula.RESULTS:========Your past results can be viewed on the device to monitor the progress.EXPLANATION :=============Correct answers can be viewed in the practice mode and  has a detailed explanation.Copyright Info:â¢ Crown copyright material reproduced under licence from the Driving Standards Agency and the controller of HMSO which does not accept any responsibility for the accuracy of the reproduction.â¢ The questions are valid for theory tests taken after September 2010

reviews.comment: I put in the right answers but it has changed them so it looks as though I\'ve put the wrong ones... Rubbish app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Tried several other apps - this one felt average, but after some practice with it I think it might be the best on the market.Have just passed my test!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: I had this test on my old mobile and downloaded it on to my new 1 sat down and done all the questions over and over again kept doin it till i seen a pass and i took my real therory test 1/11/12 and on my way i done this 1 again to refresh my memory and i got a pass on this and thanks to the app i passed my therory thank you so i would recommend!!! 5 stars \342\230\205\342\230\206\342\230\205\342\230\206\342\230\205 :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Out dated and crap
reviews.comment: One question is about topping up a battery. You should never mess about with your battery, if it\'s got an issue, get a new one! This app must have been made in 1956!!!
